attributes.background:
This is a day centre for adults with disabilities.
For many of these adults, this is all they have and taking this out of their lives would leave a huge hole in their lives. Imagine losing one of the most important things in your life. Would you like it?
Show your good side and please sign this...

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The closure of the Elliman Resource Centre is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here:

http://www.slough.gov.uk/moderngov/mgePetitionListDisplay.aspx
